attributes.action: ABOLISH THE TV (TAX) LICENCE & FORCE THE BBC TO FUND ITS SELF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why in this day and age, should we the British people be forced to pay a monthly tax for an outdated and out of touch service.

The BBC is a complete waste of money, the programs are either cook it, quiz it or repeat it. Mainly Repeat it!!

There are now 100's, if not thousands of TV channels, why should we pay for the BBC?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
